data.title: Summit General Contractors, Inc.
data.meta_description: Summit General Contractors, Inc. is led by company President, Steve Clark. Steve has over 30 years experience in retail, commercial, and industrial construction working for national retailers, commercial retail developers, [...]Read More...
data.text:
Summit General Contractors, Inc. is led by company President, Steve Clark. Steve has over 30 years experience in retail, commercial, and industrial construction working for national retailers, commercial retail developers, and business owners. With his drive and determination and a well experienced staff, Summit has earned the reputation of providing on-time projects while maintaining the clientâ€™s budget.

Over the last 8 years, Summit has successfully completed over 400 projects throughout the Southeast, Northeast, and Midwest. Licensed in 23 states, Summit has increased its revenue growth each year and has developed and maintained solid relationships with numerous clients. With diverse building experience and a commitment to excellence, Summit offers construction services you can count on!

Summit can provide preliminary estimates with accurate, well defined copes of work or budgeting purposes. After the initial architectural design and development of the project construction documents, Summit will deliver a construction cost estimate you can depend on. Summit can also provide full scale design/build services. As the liaison between owner, contractor, and other design professionals, Summit will coordinate all aspects of the design for its clients.

Summit specializes in ground-up and new construction projects as well as services for existing renovations and open store remodels. Summit will organize and schedule all necessary trades to complete your projects on time. Summit has the experience and expertise to execute and safely manage all aspects of construction for each phase of your projects. In fact, all field staff and key office staff are OSHA certified in project safety.

Summit accepts challenges and understands the importance of keeping our clients informed throughout the construction process. Communication and coordination are two key ingredients for a successful project. Whether you have a shopping center project, retail space, office complex, or a hospitality project, you can count on Summit to provide quality construction at affordable prices.
